item.title: LA fires live updates: 18 missing as death toll rises
item.description: At least 27 people are believed to be dead and more than a dozen others remain unaccounted for as multiple wildfires rage across Southern California.

item.title: Parade of planets this month will feature celestial bodies in alignment
item.description: A parade of planets is expected to light up the night sky in January.

item.title: LA wildfire victims: What we know about those killed
item.description: Family members have begun to identify the residents who were killed in the devastating wildfires in the Los Angeles area.

item.title: 2 dead, 2 injured after man attacks group of people with a stick
item.description: Two people are dead, and two others have been injured after a man allegedly attacked a group of homeless people with a stick, police said.

item.title: Biden pardons nearly 2,500 nonviolent drug offenders
item.description: "With this action, I have now issued more individual pardons and commutations than any president in U.S. history," President Joe Biden wrote in his an...
